comments:
Step 1) Create a plain old Java Project
Step 2) Try to create a Servlet using the WTP wizard
Step 3) Type anything in the class name section. 

I realize the Servlet wizard is tightly integrated with WTP projects, but you should still be able to use it even when not using WTP projects. At least don't blow up.
